body_html:
Adding @Yangqing and @mingzhe09088 to this one, since it will likely get worse when we remove BUILD_ATEN and BUILD_CAFFE2 and build everything.

@yf225 , any thoughts on how close are we to the 65535 limit? We actually make some effort to match visibility across platforms (see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/core/common.h) but it's possible that we need to trim things down more.
body_text:
Adding @Yangqing and @mingzhe09088 to this one, since it will likely get worse when we remove BUILD_ATEN and BUILD_CAFFE2 and build everything.
@yf225 , any thoughts on how close are we to the 65535 limit? We actually make some effort to match visibility across platforms (see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/core/common.h) but it's possible that we need to trim things down more.
body:
Adding @Yangqing and @mingzhe09088 to this one, since it will likely get worse when we remove `BUILD_ATEN` and `BUILD_CAFFE2` and build everything.

@yf225 , any thoughts on how close are we to the 65535 limit? We actually make some effort to match visibility across platforms (see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/core/common.h) but it's possible that we need to trim things down more.
